description: Essential building repairs to cemetery gatehouse including repairs to the stonework, cleaning and repointing of the stonework externally, re-roofing of the full building, repairs to the internal floors, stairs, and windows, and general works as necessary as a first step to safeguard the buildings' long-term sustainable future (Application for Listed Building Consent).
decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.

To comply with Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
24/150/01 Rev C (Ground Floor Plan Showing Structure Over - Joist design and wall straps)
24/150/02 Rev C (Ground Floor Plan Showing Ground Floor Structure - Joist Design & Wall Straps)
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012), Part 2 (2020) and the London Pla

All new works and works of making good to the retained fabric of the building, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the existing fabric with regard to methods used and to material, colour, texture, and profile.
To safeguard the special architectural and/or historic interest of the building in accordance with Policies DMHB 1 and DMHB2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).
Any damage caused to the building in execution of the works shall be made good to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority within 6 months of the works being completed.
To safeguard the special architectural and/or historic interest of the building in accordance with Policies DMHB 1 and DMHB 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020)
